Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • domo.educational.mvc.Sensor

  • public class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Stefano Falzaresi Stefano.Falzaresi2@studio.unibo.it This class represent a Standar Sensor with a typology enum

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sensor(java.lang.String sName, int sId, SensorTypology sType)
      Constructor of this element has the difference to accept an enum "sType" as type of sensor.

      • setAlert

        public void setAlert(boolean sAlert)
        This method set the alert status and, if the alert is "true" and the previous status was "false". the alert count will be incremented by one
        Parameters:
        sAlert - a boolean alert status
